casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William COOPER, Jr. No. 371P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of August 2007 by Defendant to Deny State's Motion to Deem Timely Filed It's Response to Defendant's Petition for Discretionary:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2007."
